title: Cuisinart Single Serve Brewing System Coffee Bar Collection (SS-700) How-To
description:
Learn more: http://www.cuisinart.com/products/coffee_bar/ss-700.html

Perfect for both personal use and entertaining, this single-serve home-brewing system offers consumers fresh gourmet coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more in under one minute. Using Keurig K-

asset.author: CuisinartVideo
asset.hookText:
Learn more: http://www.cuisinart.com/products/coffee_bar/ss-700.html

Perfect for both personal use and entertaining, this single-serve home-brewing system offers consumers fresh gourmet coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more in under one minute. Using Keurig K-Cups®—featuring over two hundred varieties of pre-measured, premium brand coffee and tea—this brewer's innovative one-touch technology makes it easier than ever for consumers to enjoy a wide array of hot beverages. 

Join us:
http://www.facebook.com/cuisinart
http://www.twitter.com/cuisinart
http:www.pinterest.com/cuisinart
